tagline: Behavior Driven Agile JavaScript Development and Test Framework
body:
## How it flows
![Diagram](http://www.websequencediagrams.com/cgi-bin/cdraw?-BS8gcHV0IC8gZGVsZXRlADoHAIRYCgCCfw8AgQoGAIUBCAABGgCBAyA&s=qsd)

[Large Diagram Image](http://www.websequencediagrams.com/cgi-bin/cdraw?-BS8gcHV0IC8gZGVsZXRlADoHAIRYCgCCfw8AgQoGAIUBCAABGgCBAyA&s=qsd)

## Examples (WORK IN PROGRESS)
    Hello NexusJS
        index.html (example app)
        tests.html (BDD/UI/Back-End/Generating & Resolving Route Tests)
    Twitter Light
        index.html (example app)
        tests.html (BDD/UI/Back-End/Generating & Resolving Route Tests)
        backend: .Net MVC 3, NodeJS
    Twitter Light example on Heroku (NexusJS frontend with NodeJS backend)
        http://twitterlight.herokuapp.com

## Turn agile story acceptance tests into NexusJS code
    https://github.com/aksharp/NexusJS.Agile

## Questions & Suggestions
    Follow me on twitter @aleq @NexusJS for latest updates
    Contact me at alex@nexusjs.com
